title: kAriruL keLaviyE
sahitya:
kariruL keLaviyE kavalaippaDum pOdu kAlaiyin pon mukham kATTAi


anupallavi

  Aringu tuNaiyena varundiDum pOdu nI anbuLLa naNbanAi varuvAi paramA


caraNam    vanja nanja nari pulimayak-kATTilE vazhi naDattit-tuNai taruvAi
anjavarum paghaiyiDargaL aghalavE aruT-kanal vIsuvAi guruvE Om sharaN
